episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Serena near an
apparel shop looking troubled.

Oh hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I was just
shooting my own PR video.

I’m making a short video to share my fashion and
performances with everyone.
Trainer PR videos are popular in Kalos, too.

I thought it would be similar to that and tried
shooting one, thinking it would be fun.
But I’m not satisfied with how it turned out.

Hey...if possible, could you help me shoot
my video?

(Surprisedly ask why she’s
asking you.)

I’m asking because it has to be you. It can’t be
just anyone.

(Worriedly ask if she’s sure you’re the
best choice.)
Of course! I can’t ask just anybody.

I have my own opinions about what I like when it
comes to fashion...
But I also want to implement other ideas.

That’s why I want your help,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].

(Say you hope to meet
her expectations.)

Thanks! I think your point of view could help
discover a new me!
(Proudly say she can count on you.)

Thanks! I want to pull off the looks you think are
perfect for me.
You’ll be my producer, so I’m counting on you!
Let’s prepare the shoot and meet up here again!
OK then, let’s start shooting!
By the way...do you like long or short hair?
(Say you like long hair.)

I like long hair, too, since you can arrange it into
different hairstyles. You can also create silhouettes
and show some personality.
(Say you like short hair.)
Short hair definitely looks stylish...
Anyway, thanks! I got it.

Before starting the shoot, I wanted to know what
you like... Er, as a producer, of course.
Anyway...let’s begin!
How would you like me to pose next?
(Ask for a cute pose.)
Like this?
(Ask for a cool pose.)
Leave it to me!
Did you get a good shot?
Let’s try again with a different outfit!
Phew... We finally managed to finish.
Let’s check it out! I’m so excited!

Yup, it’s great! I definitely couldn’t have done this
by myself.

I made the right decision by asking you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].

When you’re not sure, it’s important to connect
with others. You don’t have to worry all on
your own!

It’s the same for both people and Pokémon.
And doing so can open you up to new possibilities!

Thanks so much for today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Hey, do you want to get some desserts on our
way back? It’ll be my treat, because I want to
thank you!

The next time I shoot a video, I want you to be my
producer again, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
